casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jane Brock WHALEY. No. 440PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2007. Phillip T. Jackson, Marion, Robert B. Long, Jr., William A. Parker, Asheville, Eric M. Lieberman, for Jane Brock Whaley. Elizabeth L. McKay, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2007 by Attorney General to Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of October 2007."
